r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.2M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Russell Chernoff Rand Thompson. The average
  contract duration was 2.3 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $458.1K. The longest
  contract was 5.68 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.1M.
lookup_name: 'RUSSELL CHERNOFF RAND THOMPSON'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.2M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '27'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '12'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '44%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '641%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.67'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '4.4M'
s424_mean_duration: '2.3'
s421_mean_contract_value: '458.1K'
s425_max_duration: '5.68'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.1M'
